content:
# autoreply-prototype
prototype app for auto reply system
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "proto-auto-reply",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node ./bin/www",
    "build": "npm-run-all build:*",
    "build:es6": "./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "esdoc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc && open ./docs/esdoc/index.html",
    "apidoc": "./node_modules/aglio/bin/aglio.js -i ./src/blueprint/sample.md -o ./docs/blueprint/sample.html && open ./docs/blueprint/sample.html",
    "test": "node_modules/.bin/nyc --report-dir=./report/coverage npm run test:cmd",
    "test:cmd": "XUNIT_FILE=./report/test/xunit.xml CF_LOGGER_OUTPUT_LEVEL=warning NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register --exit --reporter list || exit 0"
  },
  "nyc": {
    "include": [
      "src/**/*.js"
    ],
    "exclude": [
      "src/error.js"
    ],
    "extension": [
      ".js"
    ],
    "reporter": [
      "text",
      "lcov"
    ],
    "all": true
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": "8.x"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@yj-intl/node-cf-logger": "0.0.9",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-runtime": "^6.26.0",
    "cookie-parser": "~1.4.3",
    "debug": "~2.6.9",
    "express": "~4.16.0",
    "http-errors": "^1.6.3",
    "json-server": "^0.12.2",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.3",
    "path": "^0.12.7",
    "qs": "^6.5.2",
    "superagent": "^3.8.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "aglio": "^2.3.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.3",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.4",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-preset-stage-0": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-1": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-2": "^6.24.1",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^16.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^2.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-mocha": "^5.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.6.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.9.1",
    "glob": "^7.1.2",
    "gulp": "^3.9.1",
    "lodash": "^4.17.10",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "mocky": "^0.1.11",
    "nyc": "^12.0.2",
    "prettier": "^1.12.1",
    "prettier-eslint": "^8.8.1",
    "prettier-eslint-cli": "^4.7.1",
    "sinon": "^6.1.3",
    "supertest": "^3.1.0",
    "webpack": "^4.9.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^2.1.4",
    "webpack-hot-middleware": "^2.22.2",
    "webpack-livereload-plugin": "^2.1.1",
    "webpack-node-externals": "^1.7.2",
    "xunit-file": "^1.0.0"
  }
}
